url.raw: {{siteURL}}/crmRestApi/resources/latest/subscriptions?q=(CustomerLocation_c='150-C143350' and Status='ORA_Active' and Location_c='DFW010') and SubscriptionNumber like '%XC%'

query.value: (CustomerLocation_c='150-C143350' and Status='ORA_Active' and Location_c='DFW010') and SubscriptionNumber like '%XC%'

response.body: The subscription number must be unique. (OSS-6075017)

{
    "AssetNumber": "130-C14297-XC-809827-INCCC-Fiber-JH-TEST1", //need to be unique Use product PUID 
    //"OperatingOrganizationName": "DLR Item Master Org",

    "Quantity": 1,
